default_insights.title: Nutritional Assessment
default_insights.description: Product analyzed for health factors and ingredient quality

default_insights.title: Balanced Consumption
default_insights.description: Consider overall dietary balance and moderation in consumption

default_insights.title: Whole Foods Focus
default_insights.description: Prioritize whole, minimally processed foods when possible

default_insights.title: Candy/Sweets Guidance
default_insights.description: Treat as an occasional snack; prefer smaller portions

default_insights.title: Sugar Balance
default_insights.description: Pair sweets with a protein/fiber snack to blunt spikes

vegetables.positive: Rich in vitamins, minerals, and fiber - excellent nutritional choice
vegetables.tip: Aim for colorful variety to maximize nutrient diversity

proteins.positive: Good protein source for muscle health and satiety
proteins.tip: Consider lean options and plant-based proteins for variety

carbs.neutral: Provides energy - choose complex carbs when possible
carbs.tip: Whole grains offer more nutrients and fiber than refined options

dairy.tip: Choose unsweetened varieties to avoid added sugars

processed_foods.warning: Highly processed foods may contain additives and excess sodium
processed_foods.tip: Rinse canned items to reduce sodium content
